column5: Hey everyone how do I get pics from my iPhone on to here ??? Don't know if I cAn from mobile site or do I need desktop site and go from my usual photo bucket ??? Thanks
I email them to myself, then upload to photobucket from there. There have been some big eyes coming out up your way, huh? I can't seem to find any in the slot though.....getting hungry LOL  S,.
As far as I know you cant post direcly from your iPhone...  I do like sinker...  Email the pic to yourself the post from you computer
I accecc my website with FTP and upload to my site then post the link with the  tags. I'm also jailbroken so I have more options to do it.

I use Dropbox...its free software that you load from the Appstore. The advantage here is once you drop a file(picture, worddoc, whatever) into it on your iphone, it is accessible anywhere. I was in Europe last year and used someone elses computer to get my files.  Just an option.  Dave
I have a Flickr account and use their iPhone app to upload my pictures, then copy the code into my post.
photobucket works on blackberry upload directly from the phone to here just like from the comp
download photobucket from ur iphone then u can upload pics from it
Thats all I do just get photobucket
